alert.note: Alert for Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 07 at 11:45PM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of the Monterey Peninsula through 1215 AM PST... At 1145 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm offshore from Pacific Grove, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Monterey, Pacific Grove and Del Monte Forest. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast
